body:
- Bumped target SDK to 30
- Handled scoped storage - setCopyImagesToPublicGalleryFolder should work again on devices running Android 10 or newer
- Fixed rotation of images when saving to public gallery

- Fixed bug with overriden module name
- Fixed bug with multiple images on documents
- Added EasyImageStateHandler to builder for saving state
- Updated gradle
Solved the issue of Fragment `onActivityResult` not being called

3.0.2

- Updated kotlin & gradle
- Removed Nammu from sample and improved permissions handling
Makes sure cleanup is done before starting a new picker

Reintroduces library in kotlin. 
It's not backward compatible, but new readme explains it all.
It became simplier and easier to maintain.
Also reintroduces support to API 15.
Adds support of AndroidX

name: Video handling
body:
- Merged PRs of video handling
- Updated gradle and stuff
Migrated to Android Studio 3 / Gradle 3
Fixed compilation errors. Basically the same as https://github.com/jkwiecien/EasyImage/releases/tag/2.0.1
Fix of https://github.com/jkwiecien/EasyImage/issues/100

Refactored a lot of code. Hoping to solve issues with file storage. This is a dangerous release. Consider it beta. However I need your support to test it.

Changes:
- Configuration class name changed to EasyImageConfiguration
- New configuration options allowing to save copied images into public gallery

Readme to be updated...

Removed allowMultiple param in case of configuration setup:
(sorry for making you refactoring, but it shouldn't be too painful)

```
        EasyImage.configuration(this)
                .setAllowMultiplePickInGallery(true);
```

This will work from choosers aswell
Fixed NPE on a single image

1) MULTIPLE images picker available for `EasyImage.openGallery()`. This will work for API 18+, and only on galleries that supports it. Like Google photos. 
2) Dropped support of SDK 14 & 15
3) Upgraded gradle & build tools
4) Added `EasyImage.canDeviceHandleGallery(Context context)` to check whether the device can support gallery intent
5) Updated sample app for multiple pickers and the function above
granting write permissions when using document chooser
Added FileProvider to support apps targeting Android N
Just merged some minor changes
Just fixed what wen't wrong in 1.2.2
Several pull requests from You were merged.
Just fixed some thing that I forgot in 1.2.0

- Refactored method names, updating will require some refactoring in client code
- Added type param
- Fixed minor issues
Fixed EOENT while using default directory.

From 1.1.2
1. Fixed clear configuration

From 1.1.1
1. Added public temp directory as an option for picked pictures (gallery or documents)
2. Fixed configuration issues
3. Added different chooser with gallery instead documents
4. Updated sample app with runtime permissons

1. Added public temp directory as an option for picked pictures (gallery or documents)
2. Fixed configuration issues
3. Added different chooser with gallery instead documents
4. Updated sample app with runtime permissons

1) Added real gallery picker and replaced current gallery picker with documents picker.
2) Additional configuration
